thread.title: Fast & Furious 8 is East Coast bound, as Vin Diesel confirms the franchise is coming to New York - Movies
thread.title_full: Fast & Furious 8 is East Coast bound, as Vin Diesel confirms the franchise is coming to New York - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Fast & Furious 8 is East Coast bound, as Vin Diesel confirms the franchise is coming to New York - Movies
text: It's official - Fast & Furious 8 is going to be storming the streets of New York City.The eighth instalment of the blockbuster franchise will hit cinemas in 2017, with Straight Outta Compton's F Gary Gray taking over directing duties from James Wan. During an appearance on The Tonight Show on Wednesday (October 14), Vin Diesel let slip the franchise will be coming to the East Coast."Would you know where the next one is set, or no?" hosted Jimmy Fallon asked, prompting Diesel to declare: "New York, baby!"Diesel also recently announced that the Fast & Furious series will end with "one last trilogy" following a historic box office run.The next film is expected to open on April 14, 2017, with Jason Statham likely to return as the vengeful assassin Deckard Shaw.
